definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: It's really interesting that palindromes can be read in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 回文诗顺着倒着都能念，真有意思。

sentences.english: And now let's do one, a, two. Whoops.
sentences.chinese: 它还告诉我这个数组是回文的？

sentences.english: Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3-digit numbers.
sentences.chinese: 找出两个三位数乘积所能制造处的最大回文数。

sentences.english: Is the new password a palindrome of the old one?
sentences.chinese: 新密码是否旧密码的回文？

sentences.english: Palindromes should be reported all in uppercase characters.
sentences.chinese: 全部用大写字母来输出回文。

sentences.english: Palindrome poem refers to the cis-read and read back the same string.
sentences.chinese: 回文诗指顺读和倒读都一样的字符串。

sentences.english: The first 33 palindromes were both riddles and profound.
sentences.chinese: 前33句回文既是谜语又很深奥。

sentences.english: Click the letters to switch their places and unscramble to palindromes.
sentences.chinese: 按字母切换地点和解密的回文。

sentences.english: You may report palindromes in any order.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用任意顺序输出回文。

sentences.english: Palindrome poem is a unique literature type of the ancient poems of our country.
sentences.chinese: 回文诗是我国古典诗歌中一种较为独特的体裁。

sentences.english: Palindrome is the experiment by running, after downloading can use.
sentences.chinese: 是回文的实验已经通过运行，下载后就可以使用了。

sentences.english: A palindrome is a symmetric character sequence that looks the same when read backwards, right to left.
sentences.chinese: 回文指的是前后读相同的中心对称的字符序列。
是否还是一个回文呢？让我提醒你一下。

sentences.english: Find the largest palindrome made from the product of two 3-digit numbers.
sentences.chinese: 请找出由两个三位数的积构成的最大回文数。

sentences.english: Write a program that finds palindromes in input lines.
sentences.chinese: 编写一个程序找出在输入行中的回文。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, poets are creative in producing visual effects, which is shown in English typographical poems and Chinese palindrome poems.
sentences.chinese: 这表现在书写形式变异的英文诗和中国的回文诗。

definition: names of the tunes to which 詞|词[ci2] poems are composed
long poem in lüshi form 律詩|律诗
poetic form consisting of four lines of five syllables, with rhymes on first, second and fourth line
level and oblique tones (technical term for Classical Chinese rhythmic poetry)
regular verse/strict poetic form with eight lines of 5, 6 or 7 syllables and even lines rhyming
(literary) to end/to stop/one of the stanzas (usually two) of a ci poem 詞|词[ci2]/classifier for songs or ci poems
a departing gift/a souvenir on leaving/a poem to mark one's departure
rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
forms of versification/conventions regarding set number of words and lines, choice of tonal patterns and rhyme schemes for various types of Classical Chinese poetic composition/metrical verse
to pause at appropriate points in reading aloud unpunctuated writing/to punctuate
